actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the commemoration on September 17, 1975, of Citizenship Day and Constitution Week by the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides for the commemoration on September 17, 1975, of Citizenship Day and Constitution Week by the House of Representatives. Directs that such commemoration shall include a reading of the Preamble and article one of the Constitution as well as a symbolic rededication by the Members of the House to the Constitution.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the commemoration on September 17, 1975, of Citizenship Day and Constitution Week by the House of Representatives.
